page.title: 10Pets
page.content: Many people keep pets.Most people, especially old people, keep pets for company and for security reasons. Others find them fun to play with and get enjoyment from their animals. The most popular pet in a survey out of 34 families , was the fish.15 families had fish.The second most popular pet was the dog . This animal is a companion in many ways.The dog for the blind is the eyes for the blind person and ears for the person who is deaf.13 families had dogs.The third most popular pet was the cat.13 families had cats for pets. The most unusual pet was the parrot.A boy in our class has 25 parrots that his dad breeds and sells. Four girls in our class had ponies.
